title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message:
Hi 
this is very clean 2015 retina 15" logic board. No liquid dmg.


This goes about 75% and stuck on apple logo.

I disconnected everything and even only with board and the screen still same result.

booting with osx installation drive it boots and can install the new osx. after installed it stuck same as beofre.

Tried with externeal usb SSD osx , same result.

Any help greatly appreciate

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Try new battery first!!! Bad battery will cause no boot on these. Sometimes has to have a good battery hooked up to boot

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Hi thank you for your reply. Did clean me same situation. any clue?

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Tried known good battery, as John mentioned?

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message:
hi,

I'm trying with our the battery connected. still stuck on apple logo. I have anothe same board which works fine with the same topcase and the battery.

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Did you clean ME with Medusa?

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Make sure to rule out all housing issues (I/O board and cable, trackpad, SSD, etc.) And yes what did you clean ME with?

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: No i removed the bios and cleaned the me region using ezp bios reader. I checked the board puuling out board by itself with a screen and usb mouse only. still same

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message:
You MUST clean ME region properly.
If you don't have Medusa programmer, search the forum; you'll find how to do it in manual way.

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message:
HI 2info.
Finally i got the Madusa 2 and did clean me successfully. Still the issue is there stuck in apple logo. how ever it boots with OSX install usb to install screen. Tried with external usb Hdd same issue.
Apple logo stuck about little over to 30% of loading.

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Also if the GPU is thr problem will this boot with OSX install usb?

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message:
"it boots with OSX install usb to install screen"
Do you mean machine enters to OSX desktop using preinstalled USB pendrive?
If so, switch to dGPU (try gfxcardstatus) and see if crashes.

title: 820-00426 stuck on apple logo
message: Hi, NO it does not boot with preinstalled USB. What i mean It boots with Any USB bootable drive to diskutilities and OSX install screen.
